titles.title: A resolution commending President Bush on conclusion of the START II Treaty.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary: 2/2/1993--Introduced. Commends George Bush on the successful conclusion of the START II Treaty. Declares that the Senate intends to take up the Treaty at the earliest possible moment. Calls on President Clinton to: (1) encourage the ratification of START II by the Russian Parliament and of START I by the parliaments of Belarus and Ukraine; and (2) support assistance to the republics of the former Soviet Union as a means to secure the timely implementation of the START I and START II treaties.
